events.name: Kingdom Duel (KvK)
events.description: 6-Stage Server War with Territory, Tech, and Cross-Server Conquest

stages.name: Preparation Phase
stages.strategy: Max out your Castle level and key buildings. Stock up on speedups.
tips: Save all construction speedups for this stage
Prioritize Castle, Research Cottage, and Barracks
Join rallies for bonus points

stages.name: Technology Phase
stages.strategy: Push high-level research that you've been saving. Research points = big scores.
tips: Have Brawler (Epic) at 2-Star Platinum for +30% research speed
Save long research timers for this stage
Use all research speedups you've been hoarding

stages.name: Power Phase
stages.strategy: Level up heroes, upgrade skills, enhance traits
tips: Save hero exp bottles for this stage
Skill upgrades give huge power boosts
Focus on your main 5-6 heroes

stages.name: Recruitment Phase
stages.strategy: Mass summon heroes. Every summon gives points.
tips: Save all recruitment tokens for this stage
Even Common summons give points
Use faction-specific summons for bonus points

stages.name: Pet Phase
stages.strategy: Level and evolve your pets. Pet power counts heavily.
tips: Stock up on pet food in advance
Pets give massive combat power
Focus on leveling over evolving for points

stages.name: Final Conquest
stages.strategy: All-out war phase. Rally, defend, attack. Team coordination is key.
tips: Coordinate with your guild
Use shields strategically
Save best troops for crucial battles
Communication wins wars

preparation.title: How to Prepare for KvK
steps: Hoard speedups (don't use any for 2 weeks before)

mistakes_to_avoid: Using speedups before the event starts

events.name: Guild Arms Race
events.description: 6-Day cycle where guilds compete on different development aspects each day

dailySchedule.strategy: Complete building upgrades. Save big upgrades for Monday.
Start long research timers. Use speedups to finish them.
Participate in all guild events. Donate to guild tech.

tips: Save activities for the matching day when possible
Coordinate with guild to maximize points
Even small contributions matter
Daily participation rewards add up
Top guilds get exclusive rewards

events.name: Citadel Clash
events.description: 4-Round Guild Tournament with betting mechanics and tier advancement
features: Betting system - wager on match outcomes
Tier advancement - win to move up tiers

strategy.title: How to Win Citadel Clash
tips: Scout opponent lineups before attacking
Use faction advantage (Nature > Horde > League > Nature)
Save your best team for crucial matches
Coordinate attacks with guild members
Bet on matches you understand
Learn from losses - adapt your lineup

events.name: Frostfield Battle
events.description: 45-minute guild war with unlimited troop deployment

mechanics.title: Core Mechanics
systems: Magic Core economy - manage resources during battle
Building advantages - capture and hold key structures

strategy.early_game: Capture resource buildings first. You need Magic Cores to deploy more troops.
strategy.mid_game: Control key strategic points. Deny enemy resources.
strategy.late_game: Final push for enemy stronghold. Coordinate massive attacks.
tips: Communication is everything
Rotate your heroes - they can die and respawn
Resource buildings > kills early game
Save ultimates for team fights
Defend your core buildings

events.name: Ancient Battlefield
events.description: 5v5 squad strategy on a three-lane map with tower control
objectives: Win by destroying enemy core or higher score at time limit

strategy.laning: Tanks front, DPS middle, Support rotating
strategy.objectives: Dark Medals give huge advantages - fight for them
strategy.teamfights: Group up for major objectives. Don't fight alone.
tips: Map awareness is crucial
Ping objectives for your team
Defend is easier than attack - use that
Comeback mechanics exist - never give up

events.name: Glory Battlefield
events.description: Race to 200,000 points through captures and eliminations
events.win_condition: First team to 200,000 points OR higher score when time expires

point_sources.strategy: Control center point for consistent points
Target weak enemies, don't die carelessly
Defense is key - hold your points

strategy.early: Rush to capture points quickly. Early lead matters.
strategy.mid: Rotate between points. Don't let enemy capture freely.
strategy.late: If ahead, play defensive. If behind, take risks.
tips: Center point usually worth most - fight for it
Don't chase kills if you're ahead - protect points
Split push can work if enemy groups up
Respawn and rejoin fights quickly

eventTips.title: General Event Strategy
preparation: Always check event schedule in advance
Join active guild for guild events
Save speedups and tokens for event days
Read event rules carefully - they change
rewards: Compare reward tiers - sometimes next tier isn't worth effort
Save premium rewards for when you need them
